meanings.sent1: The overeager puppy wagged its tail nonstop.
meanings.sent2: She was overeager to start her new job and impress her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The overeager student raised their hand before the teacher finished asking the question.
meanings.sent4: His overeager attempts to please everyone ended up causing more harm than good.
meanings.sent5: The overeager fans cheered loudly at the concert, showing their excitement.

meanings.sent1: The overeager child kept asking for more candy.
meanings.sent2: He was overeager to prove himself, but ended up making mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The overeager shopper bought too many items and regretted it later.
meanings.sent4: Her overeager response to criticism only made the situation worse.
meanings.sent5: The overeager driver honked impatiently at the traffic light, eager to move forward.
